New Records: Nikola Jokić and Russell Westbrook became the first pair of teammates to record triple-doubles in the same game multiple times in a single season.
Nikola Jokić recorded 35 points, 15 assists, and 12 rebounds.
Russell Westbrook recorded 25 points, 10 assists, and 11 rebounds.
Key Match Events: Denver Nuggets secured a 124-105 victory over the Brooklyn Nets.
The game marked the Nuggets' sixth win in their past eight games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets climbed to fourth in the Western Conference standings with a 22-15 record.
Others: Betting odds for the game were DEN -188, DAL +158, with a spread of DEN -4.5 and a total points prediction of 228.5.
